build.buildCommand: npm install --legacy-peer-deps --include=dev && echo '=== Starting build ===' && npm run build 2>&1 && echo '=== Checking dist folder ===' && ls -la dist/ && echo '=== Checking if main.js exists ===' && (test -f dist/main.js && echo '✅ main.js found!' || (echo '❌ ERROR: main.js NOT FOUND!' && exit 1)) && npx prisma generate
